org.redpin.android.ui
Class ServerPreferences

java.lang.Object
  PreferenceActivity
      org.redpin.android.ui.ServerPreferences

public class ServerPreferences
extends PreferenceActivity

Class represents an activity responsible for Preferences screen through which the user can change shared preferences.

Author:
Luba Rogoleva (lubar@student.ethz.ch)
